To all those people saying that this gets stuck at 99.9%. Yes this is true, HOWEVER it is only because the file agbx.txt does not download.

why? I dont know. But it does not matter in the slightest. This file is a file generated by abgx and has no effect on the game whatsoever. So stop complaining.

Also, there is a common misconception about seeders and leechers. They have nothing to do with your upload/download ratio!. Seechers are users who have got 100% completion and continue to upload and thats it.
As no one is getting to 100% (only 99.9%) completion there are no seeders reported.

The file works perfectly. Please think before complaining. nismo spent alot of time uploading these.

Thanks!

You can burn it even stucked at 99,9%, it works perfecty.
